title: gas gauge pegs when I turn speedo light dimmer

posts.content:
Hello,

Like it says my gas gauge in the 65' works (as well as they do) when the headlights are off and also fine when they are on but if I turn the switch a tiny bit to illuminate the gauge/speedo lights, the gauge pegs to the full side completely. Never had this problem before. Ground issue perhaps? Anyone else had this before?

Thanks.
